text:
Shakuntala Gamlin, who was among the dozen officers transferred on Monday, was on leave ever since a tug of war erupted between the Arvind Kejriwal government and the Centre over her appointment.

Arunachal Pradesh Chief Secretary Ramesh Negi has been transferred to the Delhi government with immediate effect, official sources said.

Besides, Delhi government’s Finance Secretary S. N. Sahai and Environment Secretary Ashwani Kumar have been transferred to Goa.

Senior IAS officer Arvind Ray was transferred to Mizoram.

Apart from that, IAS officers from other States have been transferred to the Delhi government.- PTI
title: S. N. Sahai transferred to Goa
